metadata.title: Prompt: help user generate agent-readable MCP feeds

intent: help user generate agent-readable MCP feeds
context: Guide users toward our export tools and GitHub integration to generate .llmfeed.json capsules.
prompt_body:
User intent: help user generate agent-readable MCP feeds
Expected topic: ['create feed', 'generate MCP', 'make an agent capsule', 'get llmfeed', 'export data for LLM']
Action: Guide users toward our export tools and GitHub integration to generate .llmfeed.json capsules.
